Entry.Val: Use your axe to chop apart shields. Deals extra shield damage after each hit, with horizontal splash.
Channel the fury of getting hit into more productive use: Destroying enemies. Increases power and speed upon getting hit.
Unleash devastating blows which cripple the receiver's ability to react. Drastically lowers the victim's attack power and speed.
Landing a killing blow will trigger additional swings with very high strength scaling.
